turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was looking to order four small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them, make that pepperoni and onion, one pepperoni and bacon, one sausage and pineapple, and one meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you are ordering 4 small pizzas, 1 pepperoni and onion, 1 pepperoni and bacon, 1 sausage and pineapple, and 1 meatlovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and can I get extra cheese on all of those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, please note that there is an additional charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $56, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 50 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that will be it. Thank you.
